affects:
ABILITY: Point Target
DAMAGE TYPE: Magical
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
desc: Turns the enemies' numbers against them, dealing damage and granting you bonus movement speed per unit or per hero.  Deals bonus damage to illusions and summoned units as a percent of their current health.
attrib:
RADIUS: 330
BASE DAMAGE: 40/80/120/160
DAMAGE PER CREEP: 14/16/18/20
DAMAGE PER HERO: 20/35/50/65
ILLUSION DAMAGE: 25%
BONUS SPEED (CREEPS): 3%
BONUS SPEED (HEROES): 9%
SPEED DURATION: 7
cmb:
100/100/100/100
18
lore: The archers of Stonehall are ready at Tresdin's command.
name: legion_commander_overwhelming_odds

affects:
ABILITY: Unit Target
AFFECTS: Allied Units
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
desc: Removes debuffs and disables from the target friendly unit, and grants bonus attack speed and health regen for a short time.
attrib:
DURATION: 5
BONUS ATTACK SPEED: 60/80/100/120
HP REGEN: 30/40/50/60
cmb:
110
16/15/14/13
lore: The rallying horn of the Bronze Legion is able to inspire any heart.
name: legion_commander_press_the_attack

desc: When attacked, Legion Commander has a chance to immediately counterattack with bonus lifesteal.
cmb: 2.70/2.10/1.50/0.90
lore: Tresdin knows that an enemy's most vulnerable moment often follows their fiercest stroke.
name: legion_commander_moment_of_courage

affects:
ABILITY: Unit Target
AFFECTS: Enemy Heroes
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
desc:
Legion Commander and the target enemy hero are forced to attack each other for a short duration. Neither hero can use items or abilities. If either hero dies during the duration, the hero winning the Duel gains permanent bonus damage.
Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
notes: Duels will end if the units are pushed 2000 units apart.
cmb:
75/75/75
50
lore: To face a soldier of Stonehall in single combat is a challenge few can resist.
name: legion_commander_duel
